content: stay cozy with this beautiful colourful crochet granny diamond beanie pattern this cute crochet hat pattern features a unique diamond design that is formed by changing colours as you make your granny stitch and is perfect for cold days suitable for crochet beginners this pattern is easy to follow as it using the granny stitch it will make a great addition to your winter wardrobe add colors to your outfit with this crochet granny diamond beanie materials worsted weight yarn 5 0 mm crochet hook stitch markers tapestry needle sizes 0-3 months 6-12 months 1-5 years 6-10 years teen/adult > **buy more save more** > > **no codes needed** > > **get 10% discount when you purchase 2 patterns at once** > > **get 15% discount when you purchase 3 patterns at once** > > **get 20% discount when you purchase 4 patterns at once** > > **get 25% discount when you purchase 5 patterns at once** > > **get 40% discount when you purchase 10 or more patterns at once** this pattern has been thoroughly tested this is a pdf pattern and not a finished product it is a copyright issue of toyslab creations you are free to sell whatever you make from this pattern but you can t sell share or modify part or all of the pattern if you have any questions about the pattern contact me via email happy crocheting
